objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used Rundll32.exe to execute payloads.(Citation: Microsoft - Customer Guidance on Recent Nation-State Cyber Attacks)(Citation: Microsoft Deep Dive Solorigate January 2021)(Citation: FireEye APT29 Nov 2018)
